casebody.data:
Oria Franklin BROWN, Jr., v. SEARS, ROEBUCK & CO., a corporation. No. 4018. United States Court of Appeals. Tenth Circuit. Jan. 23, 1950. J. B. Dudley and Paul Dudley, Oklahoma City, Okl., and K. B. Kienzle and C. H. Tankersley, Shawnee, Okl., for appellant. Coleman Hayes, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellee.

Before BRATTON, HUXMAN and PICKETT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed January 23, 1950, on motion of appellee.
